record.field: ${'Your gift to illuminate the Christmas of ' + object.child_name if object.child_name else "Your gift to illuminate a child's Christmas"}

field.name: body_html
field.div: % set nb_contracts = len(object.active_sponsorships) % set sponsor = False % set action = 'But you can make this holiday a very special one for ' % set sponsoring = 'all the Compassion children' % if nb_contracts != 0: % set sponsor = len(object.active_sponsorships - object.contracts_paid) != 0 % set child = 'your sponsored children' % set sponsoring = 'your sponsored children' % endif % if nb_contracts == 1: % set sponsoring = 'your sponsored child' % set child = 'your child ' + object.active_sponsorships.firstname % endif % set action = action + sponsoring
field.p:
${object.salutation},
Christmas is a very special occasion in the Compassion Projects. All sponsored children and their families are invited to celebrate. We take the opportunity to show them how precious and important they are.
Each child receives a Christmas gift, whether they already have a sponsor or not. ${action}.
% if sponsor:
Write a personal Christmas card for ${child} % endif
Support us in providing a gift to each Compassion child by donating to the special Christmas Gift Fund. Use the payment slip attached or give online.
By your donation, you’ll bring a sparkle of joy and hope to the eyes of over 1.7 million children in need. Thank you!
PS: The logistics of Christmas gifts and cards is a challenge! That’s why we get to you already in September with our concern. Thank you for your understanding.
